name: mopnin
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wcel(cin(c2, c4), c3))

comment: The intersection of two open sets of a metric space is open. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)
